    • Method Detail

      • initialize

      • shutdown

        public static void shutdown()

      • getOrCreateCounter

        public static com.codahale.metrics.Counter getOrCreateCounter(String name)
        Get an existing counter or create a new one if the requested one does not yet exist. Creation is synchronized to assure that only one instance of the counter is created.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the counter
        Returns:
        new Counter, or existing one if it already exists. This will return null if the metrics have not been initialized.

      • getOrCreateTimer

        public static com.codahale.metrics.Timer getOrCreateTimer(String name)
        Get an existing timer or create a new one if the requested one does not yet exist. Creation is synchronized to assure that only one instance of the counter is created.
        Parameters:
        name - timer name
        Returns:
        new Timer, or existing one if it already exists, null if the metrics have not been initialized.

      • getOrCreateGauge

        public static AtomicInteger getOrCreateGauge(String name)
        Get the AtomicInteger behind an existing gauge, or create a new gauge if it does not already exist.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of gauge. This should come from MetricConstants
        Returns:
        AtomicInteger underlying this gauge.
